text: but <@U012W4YEUTX> v3 doesnt include engagements yet right?
Hi there can the new marketing contacts feature be accessed via API. I mean the properties that define whether a contact is marketing or not. Thx for your help on that
would be worth testing if it works on the associations for the engagements though

Hopefully you're referencing a file uploaded to a server. And in that case I would bet that the server isn't whitelisting <http://HubSpot.com|HubSpot.com> to allow it to be iframed. Try iframing a regular page from the server to see if it displays correctly. Embedding PDF files in iframes should work.

Hi
Is it possible to get all contacts on a particular list with all the emails sent to them exported via API?

<@U012W4YEUTX> I haven’t checked in a while but you can have HubSpot email out to any arbitrary email address a picture of a dashboard without them needing HubSpot access.

That being said, it really depends on what metrics you need. A lot of it can be aggregated up from Engagment/Deal/Pipeline data but things like Sequence reporting has no API support
Good call, I think the email might be my workaround, I put one of my power users to work to help test it
It would be HUGE if you could access, even read only, the data of existing reports made in the GUI
Are you sure that is not already accessible
We need more detail to comment
